REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0702 reute r f BC-ANTONOVICH-<FURS>-INI 04-01 0048

TEXT.TITLE: ANTONOVICH <FURS> INITIAL OFFERING UNDER WAY
TEXT.BODY: Antonovich Inc said an initial offering of 750,000 Class A common shares is under way at 9.625 dlrs each through underwriters led by Evans and Co Inc. It said it is selling 500,000 shares and shareholders the rest. Reuter
